name: Ranch Riot
description:
Welcome to the Wild West, stranger. We three cowpokes are living an honest life. But it looks like that jerk is trying to throw trash on the ranch. Help the cowpokes defend it from ruffians like him. Draw your big iron, and aim to shoot garbage out of midair. Yeehaw!

This shooter was inspired by the Wild West, you can choose from a Cowboy, Cowgirl or...the Cow! You must shoot your way through the junk being thrown onto your ranch and gain points before time runs out. Along the way you can obtain power-ups that will help you beat That Jerk and run him off your land!

Key Features:

  • Character Select
  • Level Select
  • Custom Dialogue
  • Unique Power-Ups
  • A Rip-Roarin Good Time! 

Art:

  • Derron DeJesus

Code:

  • Jack Becker
  • Paulina Weintraub

Story/Marketing:

  • Amy Schwinge
  • Nick Hennessy

Voices:

  • Nick Hennessy

Fonts from Dafont.com

Sound effects and music from Freesound.org
